-----Original Message-----
From: Bill McKinnon [mailto:bmckinnon@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 6:41 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] JUnit & jdk1.4


My apologies if this has already been addressed.

As of jdk1.4 java defines assert as a key-word. The class TestCase and its
derivatives will cause a compiler warning for the assert methods.

Locally I renamed the 'assert' methods to '_assert' and rebuilt the test
package.

Has anyone else addressed this issue? And if so is there any consensus as
how it should be addressed?

Thanks.

Bill McKinnon
